Welcome to the orientation learning module for PSYC 2040! We will cover everything here and more on the first day of class. See you there.

## Goals

- Quick course orientation
- Show you how learning modules will work
- Get you ready for the first week

## Instructions 

Work through each of the following Read, View/Watch/listen, and Engage sections. You have the full week to complete any quizzes or assignments for this module.

When you are ready, complete the assignments in the getting started module on Canvas. Both assignments are short and are **required** this week.

1. QUIZ: Complete the getting started quiz on Canvas 
2. WRITING: Complete the short writing assignment 

Submit your work before the due date posted on Canvas. Then, move on to the next learning module.

**Note**: With the exception of *this* module (L0), all other modules will also have the option of submitting a meme, in addition to completing the quiz and/or writing assignment. All submissions should be made on Canvas. For example, see the [page for L1](https://teaching-me.github.io/cognition/articles/modules/L1_What_is_cognition.html#engage)
